After playing this game for 1027 hours i feel as if i have the experience to write a detailed and conclusive manuscript about this game and its workings.
This game, This game is something else, even with the movement of games like apex Legends nothing can rival the smoothness of movement in this game. It's infinitely more refined than other fps's such as Valorant ( where the knife feels janky) and i cannot find a single flaw in this game apart from the shared Soviet-Europe servers which can sometimes be a blessing. The angles in this game are exquisite  and the maps are carefully created without a single flaw. The matchmaking system in this game is fair but queue times are rising which is to be expected with the arrival of new games which take the light away from classics such as this fine game. The other obvoius flaw in this game is the arrival of free-to-play on December 7th and the arrival of danger mode, another Battle Royale . Along with this fine game becoming free there were many many more cheaters and playing without Prime is essentially asking for a toxic 9 year old to download free hacks off Mumbai delights And ruin everyone's game. As a proud participant in the CS:GO overwatch i can confirm that the Hacks have gotten significantly more obvious and increasing numbers of games ahve become hack battles where 1 or more players on either team compete with whoever has the best hacks. The one thing that consoles me is the number of stupid stupid idiots who have downloaded Virus's in their efforts to try and get out of Silver 1.

Overall great game but prepare to suffer if you want to play before you reach the magic level to unlock prime...
Would reccommend to others

EDIT: This is too much of a glowing report for this game, After a further 250 hours or so this game is good. Maps do have very obvious flaws. Movement does not feel particularly smooth but it's good enough. Gun play is extremely satisfying sometimes and skilled enough to make me think "I is gud at game". Games good
